prompt:
Navigate to this job posting page and wait for all content to load completely, including contact information, job description, and all details. Scroll down to make sure all content is visible.

Extract ALL available information from this job posting:

ESSENTIAL INFORMATION:
- Job title (exact full title as shown)
- Company name
- Location (full address if available: street, city, postal code, county)
- Full job description (complete text, do not truncate)
- Requirements (list ALL qualifications, skills, experience needed)
- Responsibilities (list ALL tasks and duties for this job)

CONTACT INFORMATION (very important!):
- Contact person name
- Contact email address
- Contact phone number
- Company website

ADDRESS DETAILS:
- Street address
- City
- Postal code
- County/Region
- Country (default Norge if not specified)

JOB DETAILS:
- Application deadline
- Employment type (fast ansettelse, vikariat, etc.)
- Work extent (full-time, part-time, percentage like 100%, 50%)
- Salary range if mentioned
- Start date or 'when' the job starts
- Industry/sector
- Required experience level (years)
- Required education
- FINNKODE (job ID) if visible on FINN.no

BENEFITS & PERKS:
- Benefits offered (list all: insurance, pension, training, etc.)
- Work arrangements (remote, hybrid, on-site)

IMPORTANT:
- For list fields (requirements, responsibilities, benefits), extract each item separately
- If a field is not found on the page, return null for that field
- Make sure to scroll and look for contact info - it's often at the bottom of the page
- Extract the complete job description, not just a summary

requirements.description: List of all job requirements and qualifications

responsibilities.description: List of all job responsibilities and duties

benefits.description: List of benefits and perks offered

error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_INCOMPLETE: Some job details could not be extracted
